mean_cn: n. 甲壳纲动物；  adj. 甲壳纲的
mean_en: a type of animal (such as a crab or lobster) that has several pairs of legs and a body made up of sections that are covered in a hard outer shell
sentence: Crabs are one kind of crustacean.
sentence_trans: 螃蟹是一种甲壳类动物。
word_etyma: crust外壳 + acean...性质的 → crustacean甲壳纲的（动物）
